body:
CREATE Trigger dbo.$TabloAdi$_Delete  ON [dbo].[$TabloAdi$]
FOR Delete
AS
	/* Yazan  : $USER$
		Tarih : $DATE$
	*/
SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN
	BEGIN TRY
	Declare 
	/* Cursor Variables*/
	Declare c$TabloAdi$_Delete Cursor For
	Select 
	From	Deleted d
	Open c$TabloAdi$_Delete
	Fetch Next From c$TabloAdi$_Delete Into
	While @@Fetch_Status=0 Begin

		Fetch Next From c$TabloAdi$_Delete Into
	End
	Close c$TabloAdi$_Delete
	Deallocate c$TabloAdi$_Delete
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
		Declare @ITObjectName nvarchar(126)
		Set @ITObjectName = OBJECT_NAME (@@PROCID)
		Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName
	END CATCH
END
